pkgmetadata.longdescription: Companion Datasets and Functions for Research Design in the Social Sciences // Helper functions to accompany the Blair, Coppock, and Humphreys (2022) "Research Design in the Social Sciences: Declaration, Diagnosis, and Redesign" https://book.declaredesign.org. 'rdss' includes datasets, helper functions, and plotting components to enable use and replication of the book.
